title: Apple yet to remove fake Rabby Wallet app despite users being drained
description:
The malicious app is still on Apple’s App Store four days after it was first discovered and flagged by App Store users.

A fake version of the crypto wallet app Rabby Wallet on the Apple App Store has been reportedly wreaking havoc on unsuspecting users, despite

On Feb. 16, the team behind DeBank’s Rabby Wallet confirmed that any app currently listed on the store is fake, as its official app is currently under review.

Read more: Apple removes malicious Trezor app from App Store

title: Peter Schiff Warns SEC Could Change Definition of ‘Security’ — Expects Lots of Investors to Be Retroactively Fined
description: Economist and gold advocate Peter Schiff has sounded the alarm about the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) potentially changing the definition of a “security.” He cautioned: “Now that the U.S. Appeals Court has upheld the SEC’s authority to unilaterally change the definition of a ‘dealer,’ I expect lots of private investors to be retroactively […]

title: The Rise of Biometrics in Air Travel – Experts Predict Current Year as Pivotal Moment
description: In a report published by The New York Times on Sunday (Feb. 18), experts in the travel industry predict that biometric technology, particularly facial recognition, could fundamentally transform air travel, marking a significant milestone in the integration of biometrics in air travel by the year 2024. Spearheaded by figures like Henry Harteveldt, a prominent travel […]
